New_Orleans.Milan, New Orleans:
Milan is a neighborhood of the city of New Orleans, Louisiana, U.S.A. A sub-district of the Central City/Garden District Area, its boundaries as defined by the City Planning Commission are: South Claiborne Avenue to the north, Toledano Street and Louisiana Avenue to the east, St. Charles Avenue to the south, and Napoleon Avenue to the west.


== Geography ==
Milan is located at 29°55′59″N 90°05′50″W  and has an elevation of 0 feet (0.0 m).
